The photo was posted on Facebook on May: 2020, and has been shared more than 400 times.
The photo is part of a collage of three: with the other two showing journalist Rowena Paraan, the head of the “Bayan Mo, Ipatrol Mo” citizen journalism project at ABS-CBN.
The Tagalog: language caption of the post states: "ABS CBN is really protecting NPAs."
A reverse image search on Google found t: 2013 report by MindaNews, a Philippine media organization, with a caption indicating it was taken during a first aid training for journalists and media workers.
